snippet: The Secretary of Education Arne Duncan told New York Times reporters and editors during a visit that the Obama administration has not done nearly enough to address the steep dropout rate among college students.
abstract: The Secretary of Education Arne Duncan told New York Times reporters and editors during a visit that the Obama administration has not done nearly enough to address the steep dropout rate among college students.

byline.original: By TANYA CALDWELL and JACQUES STEINBERG

headline.main: Education Secretary Targets Colleges With Low Graduation Rates
